snippet.title: City of Villains 2005 Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Sign the petition and keep making noise to try and keep the game alive!
http://www.change.org/petitions/ncsoft-keep-ncsoft-from-shutting-down-city-of-heroes

Statesman and the heroes go up against Lord Recluse and his baddies to try and recover the crystal of Serafina! One of the introduction trailers to City of Villains!

All rights reserved. City of Heroes, City of Heroes Going Rogue, City of Villains, Paragon City, Rogue Isels, paragon Studios, NCsoft, and all media are trademarks or registered trademarks of NCsoft Corporation.
